column5: Hi All.. Just an update on the wife.. She is set to have a Pet Scan on Wed to see the extent of this Lung Cancer and see if it is Operable or not.. Fingers and what ever else I have crossed.. Will know more by friday I hope.. Thanks to everyone for the Emails and calls..
Fingers and whatever crossed here as well. I hope everything works out well.
Stay positive Kelvin... I'm there with ya more than you know!
Thank my friend we might need it...
I'm sure I speak for everyone, when I say I hope for the best.
Thanks Wayne.. That's all we can do right now...
Fingers crossed and I hope for the best as well my friend! Stay strong for her!
good luck to you and your wife man, thoughts and prayers
We are also wishing for the best results for her
Prayers from our family to yours.
All of our best my friend.  All of our best.

Best wishes for ya Kelvin - positive thoughts, even in these times, have amazing powers. Here's wishing for the best of all possible outcome for ya and all who are touched by this. A coworker of mine is off right now after a masectomy - but so for the prognosis is good that it was detected early enough to catch it before it spread. May you have similar findings in your case.
Kelvin...Maribeth and I are pulling for her my friend...  Keep the Faith !
A lot of this going. My thoughts and prayers are with you and your wife. Take care of yourselves.Good luck.
